episodes.title: Surviving Jonestown: Jim Jones’ Deadly Cult #history
episodes.description:
On November 18, 1978, more than 900 people perished in the Jonestown tragedy—but one man escaped, only to lose everything he loved. This is the harrowing story of Eugene Smith, a People's Temple member who left Jonestown just days before its horrific end. While he survived, his mother, wife, and newborn son did not.

Join us as we uncover his journey—from hope to horror, from escape to unbearable loss.

🔹 HEATHSTORY – Home of Profound, Historic, and Timeless Stories.
📅 New episodes every Sunday at 9 AM and Wednesday at 1 PM EST
👍 Like, subscribe, and hit the bell to never miss a story!

#Jonestown #History #TrueStory
